name: Velvet Body Wash, Wild Rose & Cherry Blossom
description: Awaken your senses with a burst of Wild Rose and Cherry Blossoms as you gently cleanse your skin. Start your day with Velvet Bodywash Wild Rose and Cherry Blossom for an exotic rose water fragrance to keep your skin delicately perfumed, beautiful and undeniably feminine.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
